definition: to reinforce/to strengthen/to increase
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
stubborn/unyielding
surname Qiang
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
to tighten control (over sth)

sentences.english: He needs to improve his English before he can study abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他到國外唸書之前必須先加強英文。

sentences.english: I cannot overemphasize the psychological trauma to these people.
sentences.chinese: 我無法更加強強調他們所受的心理創傷。

sentences.english: Smooth downshifts are enhanced by a standard, back-torque limiting clutch.
sentences.chinese: 光滑平順而得到加強，一個標準，回扭矩限制離合器。

sentences.english: The strengthening of Ji'nan awning construction site for electricity.
sentences.chinese: 加強濟南遮陽蓬施工現場的用電辦理。

sentences.english: They said all countries need to strengthen oversight and crisis management mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 他們說所有的國家都需要加強失察和危機管理機制。

sentences.english: Fourthly, the international community should increase aid to Africa.
sentences.chinese: 第四，加強國際社會的對非援助。

sentences.english: Part IV is to discuss how to strengthenpsychology health education to suit teachers school graduates needs in ChongqingMunicipality.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分是加強重慶市中師生心理健康教育。

sentences.english: It reinforces the value of Random Password Manager to security-conscious enterprise environments.
sentences.chinese: 它加強了隨機密碼管理器在安全企業環境下的價值。

sentences.english: An increasing number of people are realising the neccesity to protect enviroment.
sentences.chinese: 世界上越來越多的人認識到加強環境保護的必要性。

sentences.english: Upholding the Scientific View of Human Talents for Strengthening the University;
sentences.chinese: 實施人才強縣戰略，必須加強人才隊伍建設。

sentences.english: Blowing on fire intensifies the heat.
To make defence education universal and foster such education is the common responsibility of the whole society.
sentences.chinese: 普及和加強國防教育是全社會的共同責任。

sentences.english: Fourth, we will continue to strengthen management of local government debt.
sentences.chinese: 四是繼續加強地方政府性債務管理。

sentences.english: For social youth groups, public propagand is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 對於社會的青少團體，更要加強宣傳力度。

sentences.english: The aseismatic fortify that strengthens crucial point branch and lifeline establishment works.
sentences.chinese: 加強要害部門及生命線設施的抗震設防工作。

definition: to strengthen/to intensify
to increase/to strengthen
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
mechanism
at the same time/simultaneously
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to launch/to develop/to unfold/(of an exhibition etc) to open
optimization/to optimize/to make superior
active/energetic/vigorous/positive (outlook)/proactive
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
related/relevant/pertinent/to be interrelated/(statistics) correlation
to provide assistance/to aid
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to promote/to enhance/to further/to advance (a cause etc)
